title: Harry Dunn's parents plead with Anne Sacoolas: 'Did you comfort him as he lay dying?'
text:
Harry Dunn’s grieving parents have called on the wife of the US intelligent agent accused of killing the teenager to say if she comforted their son as he lay dying.

The 19-year-old’s parents, who are on a visit to the US, also called on the Donald Trump administration to revoke Anne Sacoolas’s immunity.

Mrs Sacoolas, 42, a mother-of-three, is accused of driving on the wrong side of the road when she ploughed into Mr Dunn, riding his motorbike outside RAF Croughton in Northamptonshire where her husband was stationed.

But she fled to the US and cannot be prosecuted in the UK because she and her husband had been granted diplomatic immunity.

At the press conference in New York, the victim’s father...
description: Harry Dunn’s grieving parents have called on the wife of the US intelligent agent accused of killing the teenager to say if she comforted their son as he lay dying.
